commit.title: Merge branch 'master' of git://github.com/phun-ky/recess into phun-ky-master
add .gitattributes to force lf on checkout
Removed space from LESS dependency version declaration in package.json
Adding repository section to package.json to suppress warning from NPM.
Reverted that.log to console.log on line 40
Current version of recess will merge identical declarations.
Add "includePath" option to enable LESS parser to look in more places.
Update .travis.yml file to make it pass
Remove silly magic, always return an array, even when single
Make sure to keep the order of input paths in the callback array
Fix inlineImages when the less/css-file is in the current directory (and therefor does not have a diretory-component)
fix "Cannot read property 'red' of undefined" finally
Add --format option with support for "text" (default) and "compact" (one-line per error in <file>:<line>:<error> form) as per csslint. Also adds --noSummary.
Add line number as own entity in lint error data-structure.
added animation-fill-mode and backface-visibility to strict-property-order.js.
simplify api to watch for single file
clean up watch api + allow watching single files not just directories
minor tweaks to inlineImages feature ref pull req #32. added another test for embedding images that include paths.
Added pointer-events just above 'cursor' in strict-property-order.js, as this seemed like the most logical place for it.  This fixes the 'Unknown property name' error when using pointer-events.
added support to inline images in output using option --inlineImages
add experimental support for watch functionality. See if it's worth building out more.
Added support for list-style-type, list-style-image and list-style-position to the porperty order to stop 'unknown property' errors getting thrown
added some new properties to the sort order
add option for stripping colors from linting output
